file.name: pets-discriminator-allOf.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
- url: 'https://api.paymentsos.com/'
info:
  x-logo:
    url: payos_logo_blue_pad.png
    backgroundColor: white
  description: >
    # Overview
  version: 1.2.0
  title: PaymentsOS API
tags:
- name: Tokens
  description: >-
    Tokenization is a process that safeguards sensitive card data, converting
    a card's details to a representative token.
x-tagGroups:
- name: Reference
  tags:
  - Tokens
security:
- app-id: []
  private-key: []
paths:
  /pet-allOf:
    post:
      summary: Create a Pet
      security:
      - public-key: []
      description: >-
      tags:
      - pets
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/public-key'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: pet created
          headers:
            x-zooz-request-id:
              description: request id
              schema:
                type: string
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/pet-allOf'
        '400':
          description: Bad request
          headers:
            x-zooz-request-id:
              description: request id
              schema:
                type: string
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/error_model'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorize
          headers:
            x-zooz-request-id:
              description: request id
              schema:
                type: string
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/error_model'
        '500':
          description: Internal error
          headers:
            x-zooz-request-id:
              description: request id
              schema:
                type: string
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/error_model'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/pet-allOf'
        description: Create pet
        required: true
components:
  parameters:
    public-key:
      name: public-key
      in: header
      required: true
      example: f8948bac-8f29-4a82-8cef-704fb1e6b7ca
      schema:
        type: string
    page:
      name: page
      in: query
      required: true
      example: 2
      schema:
        type: string
    name:
      name: name
      in: path
      required: true
      example: kity
      schema:
        type: string
  schemas:
    error_model:
      required:
      - description
      - category
      properties:
        category:
          type: string
          description: Error code.
        description:
          type: string
          description: Error message for the developer.
        more_info:
          type: string
          description: 'More info about the error, can include link to the documentation.'
    pet:
      description: pet
      type: object
      oneOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/dog_object'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/cat_object'
    pets:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/pet"
    pet-allOf:
      description: pet
      type: object
      discriminator:
        propertyName: type
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/dog_object'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/cat_object'
    dog_object:
      type: object
      required:
      - bark
      properties:
        bark:
          type: string
    cat_object:
      type: object
      required:
      - fur
      properties:
        fur:
          type: string
          pattern: '^\d+$'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /pet-allOf: post: security: unknown security schema "public-key"
